channel.title: AP Computer Science
channel.description: Hey, I'm planning on taking AP Computer Science as a course in my senior year in high school, which is next year. I was wondering what the class teaches, it's difficulty, etc. If anyone could supply me with some information, that would be great.

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

My school has it, Its could IT though and most people hate it because all you do is read in it for the first year you take it :P, also we get 2 credits when we take it

Read full topic

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Haven’t taken it before, but I built a computer. I would suspect it would involve building a computer, debugging hardware and software problems, Identifying the background processes that run when you start it, what POST is, stuff like that.

Read full topic

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Thanks for the responses. Anyone else?

Read full topic

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

My school does not have any computer-related classes available in the curriculum, so i’m screwed over if I plan on learning anything about computer science at my school. Although i’m not fretting over it because self-teaching is the highest quality of learning in my opinion, as you experience successes and failures first-hand.

Read full topic

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @Explisionist Explisionist
item.description:
@Explisionist wrote:

I was in AP comp science in my junior year, I graduated this year… But like David said its mainly the basic’s with a few advanced settings such as learning how to build/fix a computer, and learning all the computer’s language and what the symbols mean, etc…

If you need anymore help just google AP computer science, and there are a few helpful sites.

Read full topic

item.title: AP Computer Science
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I hear that its not to difficult if you already know the basics. (Byte code, 1 and 0 ect, terminals… you know)

Im only in 9th grade so the highest class they let me into was Computer Science 1

Read full topic
